Patient ID {{ doc.patient }}
Patient Name {{ doc.patient_name.capitalize() }}
Mobile {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "mobile") }}

Blood Group {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "blood_group") }}

Date {{doc.get_formatted("encounter_date")}}
Appointment {{doc.appointment}}
Doctor {{doc.practitioner}}
Doctor Reg. No. {{ frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Practitioner", doc.practitioner, "registration_number") }}
{% if doc.symptoms -%}

    {% set symptoms = doc.symptoms.split('\n') %} {% for symptom in symptoms %}
  1. {{symptom.capitalize()}}
    2. {% endfor %}
{%- endif %} {% if doc.codification_table -%}

{%- endif %} {% if doc.drug_prescription -%}

Drug Strength Dosage Period
{{drug.drug_code}} {{drug.drug_name}} {{ drug.dosage }} {{ drug.period }}
{%- endif %} {% if doc.procedure_prescription-%}

Suggested Treatment Doctor Comments
{{treatment.procedure_name}} {{treatment.practitioner}} {{ treatment.comments }}
